entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
